name: Danushka Gunathilaka
bio: Mashtayage Danushka Gunathilaka (born 17 March 1991) is a professional Sri Lankan cricketer, who plays all formats of the game internationally. He is an opening batsman of Sri Lanka who plays with partner Kusal Perera, but occasionally removed from the squad with the injuries. He has also been occasionally sidelined due to disciplinary issues.[1] He is a left-handed batsman and right-arm off-break bowler who plays for Colombo. He was born in Panadura. He studied at Mahanama College, Colombo 03.[2]
